props.loadingText: Text shown when the data is loading.
props.rowHeight: Height of each row in pixels.

events.click:row: Emitted when a row is clicked. Native event is passed as the first argument, row data as the second.
events.contextmenu:row: Emitted when a row is right-clicked. Native event is passed as the first argument, row data as the second.

slots.[`item.${string}]`: Slot for custom rendering of a column.
slots.data-table-group: Slot for custom rendering of a group.
slots.data-table-select: Slot for custom rendering of a header cell with the select checkbox.
slots.expanded-row: Slot for custom rendering of an expanded row.
slots.group-header: Slot for custom rendering of a group header.
slots.item.data-table-expand: Slot for custom rendering of a row cell with the expand icon.
slots.item.data-table-select: Slot for custom rendering of a row cell with the select checkbox.
slots.loading: Slot for custom rendering of the loading state.
